ProjectDetailResource.description: Minimal project representation; related entities available via dedicated endpoints.

ProjectGroupResource.description: Minimal project group representation. Related entities accessible via id fields.

ProposalResource.description: Minimal proposal representation without embedded relationship objects.

SubmissionResource.description: Minimal submission representation. Related files and evaluations available via dedicated endpoints.

SubmissionEvaluationResource.description: Minimal evaluation representation without embedded relationship objects.
